request.description:
### Errors

- Reading station table does not exist!
- The table number must be between 1 and 200.
- The selected reading station id is invalid.
- Reading station user exists!
- User not found!
- The default package id field is required.
- The start date field is required.
    
- Reading station user start date should be in the future!

### Errors

- The data field is required.
- The data must be an array.
- The data.0.reading_station_slut_id field is required.
- The data.0.day field is required.
- The data.0.day does not match the format Y-m-d.
- User does not have blong to any Reading Station!
- Some of sluts are not correct!
- User has a program for the requested week!
- The week field is required.
    
- The selected week is invalid.

### Errors

- The data field is required.
- The data must be an array.
- The data.0.reading_station_slut_id field is required.
- The data.0.day field is required.
- The data.0.day does not match the format Y-m-d.
- User does not have blong to any Reading Station!
- Some of sluts are not correct!
- User has a program for the requested week!
- The week field is required.
    
- The selected week is invalid.

### Errors

- The selected id is invalid.

### Errors

- Reading station user not found!

### Errors

- User with this email exists!

item.name: Cancel Buying Of a micro product

request.description:
### Errors

- The name must be between 2 and 100 characters.
- The table start number must be between 1 and 1000.
- The table end number must be between 1 and 1000.
- Reading station start table number should be less or equal end table number!
    
- Reading station with the same name exists!

### Errors

- The required time field is required.
- The optional time field is required.
- The name field is required.
    
- Reading station package with this name exists!

### Errors

- Reading Station Package not found!

### Errors

- The name field is required.
- The name must be between 3 and 100 characters.
- The score field is required.
- The score must be at least 1.
    
- The name has already been taken.

### Errors

- Reading station absent reason with the same name available!
- The selected id is invalid.
    
- Reading Station Absent Reason not found!

### Errors

- The name must be at least 3 characters.
    
- The score must be at least 1.

### Errors

- Reading Station Strike not found!
    
- The selected id is invalid.

### Errors

- Reading Station Package not found!
